name: Ayuvera DS
shortDescription: Natural diabetes support with dual benefits for health & beauty
tagline: Naturally Manage Diabetes & Enhance Beauty with Ayurveda
fullDescription: Ayuvera DS is a powerful blend of authentic Ayurvedic herbs that helps maintain healthy blood sugar levels while enhancing your natural beauty from within. Our unique formula combines traditional wisdom with modern science to create a holistic solution for diabetes management.
dosage: Take 2 capsules daily - one in the morning and one in the evening for optimal results.

name: Ayuvera Glow Skin
shortDescription: Radiant, clear skin from within using Ayurvedic herbs
tagline: Reveal Your Natural Glow with Ayurvedic Skin Support
fullDescription: Ayuvera Glow Skin is a premium Ayurvedic formulation designed to enhance your skin's natural radiance from within. Our unique blend of time-tested herbs works to detoxify your system, balance your doshas, and promote a clear, glowing complexion naturally.
dosage: Take 2 capsules daily with warm water after meals for best results.

name: Ayuvera Hair Bloom
shortDescription: Stop hair fall and promote new growth naturally
tagline: Revitalize Your Hair from Root to Tip
fullDescription: Ayuvera Hair Bloom combines ancient Ayurvedic wisdom with modern research to create a powerful formula that addresses hair fall, thinning, and premature graying. Our unique blend strengthens hair follicles, nourishes the scalp, and promotes the growth of thick, lustrous hair.
dosage: Take 2 capsules daily - one in the morning and one in the evening after meals.

name: Ayuvera ImmunoMax
shortDescription: Powerful daily immunity boost with Ayurvedic herbs
fullDescription: Ayuvera ImmunoMax is a comprehensive immunity booster that combines the most powerful immune-enhancing herbs from the Ayurvedic tradition. Our formula helps strengthen your body's natural defense mechanisms, provides antioxidant protection, and supports overall wellness and vitality.
dosage: Take 2 capsules daily with warm water for best results.

name: Ayuvera Fit Burner
shortDescription: Natural metabolism booster for weight management
tagline: Boost Metabolism Naturally for Healthy Weight Management
fullDescription: Ayuvera Fit Burner is an advanced Ayurvedic formulation designed to enhance your body's metabolic rate naturally. Our blend of traditional herbs helps optimize digestion, reduce cravings, burn fat more efficiently, and support your weight management journey without harsh stimulants or side effects.
dosage: Take 2 capsules daily - one before breakfast and one before dinner with warm water.
